summary: The diff shows modifications to frontend/index.html removing the favicon link (REQ-1 satisfied), but no evidence of image file deletions from frontend/public/assets/generated directory (REQ-2 not satisfied). The modified files list includes project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt which are metadata/documentation updates, not actual implementation changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove any generated icon/logo image files from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no removed files. REQ-2 explicitly requires deletion of custom icon/logo files from the assets directory, but the REMOVED FILES section is empty.
